themes: support for quiet and skillful artists
preference for reflective art over attention-seeking art
need for balance and inclusivity in the arts scene
key_phrases: more support for artists whose work is quiet, skillful, and thoughtful
shows seem to focus on work that’s loud or shocking
value in art that invites reflection instead of demanding it
create a more balanced and inclusive arts scene
barriers_identified: current focus on loud or shocking art to get attention
solutions_proposed: more support for artists whose work is quiet, skillful, and thoughtful
supporting these kinds of artists would help create a more balanced and inclusive arts scene
